abstract: United States Army will pay significant monetary settlement to Teresa Gilbert, former infection control analyst at Womack Army Medical Center in Fayetteville, NC; federal investigators found she had been punished for whistle-blowing on threats to health and safety of patients at Womack, one of Army's busiest hospitals.
lead_paragraph: A former infection control analyst at Womack Army Medical Center was among those who had reported patient health and safety threats to their superiors.

headline.main: Army to Settle With Whistle-Blowing Hospital Worker at Fort Bragg
headline.print_headline: Army to Pay Monetary Settlement to Hospital Whistle-Blower Who Was Punished

snippet: A former infection control analyst at Womack Army Medical Center was among those who had reported patient health and safety threats to their superiors.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
